00120 void DesignWidget::setDesign( const VLNV* vlnv, const QString& viewName) {
00121         
00122         Q_ASSERT_X(vlnv, "DesignWidget::setDesign", "Null vlnv pointer given as parameter");
00123 
00124         disconnect(diagram_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00125                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00126 
00127         // if vlnv and view name was defined which means that an existing component is opened
00128         if (vlnv->isValid() && !viewName.isEmpty()) {
00129 
00130                 // if vlnv is valid and the type is component
00131                 if (vlnv->isValid() && vlnv->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00132 
00133                         // create model 
00134                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComponent = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
00135                         if (!libComponent)
00136                                 return;
00137 
00138                         QSharedPointer<Component> comp = libComponent.staticCast<Component>();
00139 
00140                         View* view = comp->findView(viewName);
00141 
00142                         if (!view || !view->isHierarchical()) {
00143                                 return;
00144                                 
00145                         }
00146 
00147                         // save the name of the view being edited.
00148                         viewName_ = viewName;
00149 
00150                         diagram_->setDesign(comp, viewName);
00151                         hierComponent_ = comp;
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 
00155         // if vlnv was valid but view is empty then should create a new design for the component
00156         else if (vlnv->isValid() && viewName.isEmpty()) {
00157                 Q_ASSERT(lh_->contains(*vlnv));
00158                 Q_ASSERT(lh_->getDocumentType(*vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT);
00159 
00160                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*vlnv);
00161                 hierComponent_ = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00162 
00163                 // get the directory path where the component's xml file is located
00164                 const QString xmlPath = lh_->getPath(*vlnv);
00165                 QFileInfo xmlInfo(xmlPath);
00166                 const QString dirPath = xmlInfo.absolutePath();
00167 
00168                 createDesignForComponent(hierComponent_, dirPath);
00169         }
00170 
00171         // if vlnv was not defined (a new hierarchical component is created)
00172         else {
00173                 hierComponent_ = createEmptyDesign(vlnv);
00174                 if (!hierComponent_) {
00175                         return;
00176                 }
00177                 diagram_->setDesign(hierComponent_, viewName);
00178                 viewName_ = viewName;
00179         }
00180 
00181         // disable the save at startup
00182         connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00183                     this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00184         connect(diagram_, SIGNAL(modeChanged(DrawMode)),
00185                     this, SIGNAL(modeChanged(DrawMode)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00186         setModified(false);
00187 
00188     setDocumentName(hierComponent_->getVlnv()->getName() + 
00189                             " (" + hierComponent_->getVlnv()->getVersion() + ")");
00190 
00191     if (hierComponent_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00192         hierComponent_->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM)
00193     {
00194         setDocumentType("SW Platform Stack");
00195     }
00196     else
00197     {
00198         setDocumentType("Design");
00199     }
00200 
00201         emit clearItemSelection();
00202 }

00204 bool DesignWidget::save()
00205 {
00206         QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00207 
00208         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf = diagram_->getDesignConfiguration();
00209 
00210         // create the design
00211 
00212         // if design configuration is used
00213         if (designConf) {
00214                 design = diagram_->createDesign(designConf->getDesignRef());
00215         }
00216         // if component 
00217         else {
00218                 design = diagram_->createDesign(hierComponent_->getHierRef(viewName_));
00219         }
00220 
00221     if (design == 0)
00222     {
00223         return false;
00224     }
00225     
00226         // update the hierarchical bus interfaces of the top-component
00227         diagram_->updateHierComponent(hierComponent_);
00228 
00229         // if design configuration is used then write it.
00230         if (designConf) {
00231         lh_->writeModelToFile(designConf);
00232         }
00233 
00234         lh_->writeModelToFile(design);
00235         lh_->writeModelToFile(hierComponent_);
00236 
00237     return TabDocument::save();
00238 }

00240 bool DesignWidget::saveAs() {
00241 
00242         VLNV oldVLNV = *hierComponent_->getVlnv();
00243 
00244     // Ask the user for a new VLNV along with attributes and directory.
00245     KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier = hierComponent_->getComponentHierarchy();
00246     KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness = hierComponent_->getComponentFirmness();
00247 
00248     VLNV vlnv;
00249     QString directory;
00250 
00251     if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(this, lh_, oldVLNV, prodHier, firmness, vlnv, directory))
00252     {
00253         // If the user canceled, there was no error.
00254         return true;
00255     }
00256 
00257         // create the vlnv for design and design configuration
00258         VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00259                 vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
00260         VLNV desConfVLNV(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00261                 vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".designcfg", vlnv.getVersion());
00262 
00263         QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00264 
00265         // create the design
00266 
00267         // make a copy of the hierarchical component
00268         hierComponent_ = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component(*hierComponent_));
00269 
00270         // set the new vlnv for the component
00271         hierComponent_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00272 
00273         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf = diagram_->getDesignConfiguration();
00274 
00275         // if design configuration is used
00276         if (designConf) {
00277 
00278                 // make a copy of the design configuration
00279                 designConf = QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration>(new DesignConfiguration(*designConf));
00280 
00281                 // set design configuration's vlnv to match new vlnv
00282                 designConf->setVlnv(desConfVLNV);
00283 
00284                 // set design configuration to reference to new design vlnv
00285                 designConf->setDesignRef(designVLNV);
00286 
00287                 // set component to reference new design configuration
00288                 hierComponent_->setHierRef(desConfVLNV);
00289 
00290                 // create design with new design vlnv
00291                 design = diagram_->createDesign(designVLNV);
00292         }
00293         // if component does not use design configuration then it references directly to design
00294         else {
00295                 // set component to reference new design
00296                 hierComponent_->setHierRef(designVLNV);
00297 
00298                 design = diagram_->createDesign(designVLNV);
00299         }
00300 
00301         if (design == 0)
00302         {
00303                 return false;
00304         }
00305 
00306         // update the hierarchical bus interfaces of the top-component
00307         diagram_->updateHierComponent(hierComponent_);
00308 
00309         // create the files for the documents
00310 
00311         // if design configuration is used then write it.
00312         if (designConf) {
00313         lh_->writeModelToFile(directory, designConf);
00314         }
00315 
00316     lh_->writeModelToFile(directory, design);
00317     lh_->writeModelToFile(directory, hierComponent_);
00318         
00319         setDocumentName(vlnv.getName() + " (" + vlnv.getVersion() + ")");
00320 
00321         // update the file paths of the components
00322         lh_->updateComponentFiles(oldVLNV, vlnv);
00323 
00324         return TabDocument::saveAs();
00325 }

00329         if (hierComponent_)
00330                 return hierComponent_->getVlnv();
00331

00335 void DesignWidget::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
00336 {
00337     // If the document is protected, skip all delete events.
00338     if (isProtected())
00339     {
00340         return;
00341     }
00342 
00343     if (event->key() == Qt::Key_Delete) {
00344         if (diagram_->selectedItems().empty()) {
00345             return;
00346         }
00347         QGraphicsItem *selected = diagram_->selectedItems().first();
00348 
00349         if (selected->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00350         {
00351                         DiagramComponent* component = static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(selected);
00352                         diagram_->removeInstanceName(component->name());
00353             diagram_->clearSelection();
00354             
00355             QSharedPointer<ComponentDeleteCommand> cmd(new ComponentDeleteCommand(component));
00356 
00357                         connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)),
00358                                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstanceRemoved(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00359                         connect(cmd.data(), SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)),
00360                                 this, SIGNAL(componentInstantiated(DiagramComponent*)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00361 
00362             editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00363 
00364             emit clearItemSelection();
00365         }
00366         else if (selected->type() == DiagramInterface::Type)
00367         {
00368             DiagramInterface* diagIf = static_cast<DiagramInterface*>(selected);
00369             diagram_->clearSelection();
00370 
00371             // Delete the interface.
00372             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new InterfaceDeleteCommand(diagIf));
00373             editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00374             
00375             emit clearItemSelection();
00376         }
00377         else if (selected->type() == DiagramPort::Type)
00378         {
00379             DiagramPort* port = static_cast<DiagramPort*>(selected);
00380             DiagramComponent* comp = static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(port->parentItem());
00381 
00382             // Ports can be removed only if the parent component is not
00383             // yet packaged (i.e. has an invalid VLNV).
00384             if (!comp->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00385             {
00386                 // Delete the port.
00387                 QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new PortDeleteCommand(port));
00388                 editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00389 
00390                 // Clear the item selection.
00391                 emit clearItemSelection();
00392             }
00393         }
00394         else if (selected->type() == DiagramInterconnection::Type)
00395         {
00396             // Delete the interconnection.
00397             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ConnectionDeleteCommand(
00398                 static_cast<DiagramInterconnection*>(selected)));
00399             editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00400 
00401             emit clearItemSelection();
00402         }
00403         else if (selected->type() == DiagramColumn::Type)
00404         {
00405             // Ask a confirmation if the user really wants to delete the entire column
00406             // if it is not empty.
00407             DiagramColumn* column = static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(selected);
00408 
00409             bool del = true;
00410 
00411             if (!column->isEmpty())
00412             {
00413                 QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00414                                    tr("The column is not empty. Do you want to "
00415                                    "delete the column and all of its contents?"),
00416                                    QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, this);
00417 
00418                 if (msgBox.exec() == QMessageBox::No)
00419                 {
00420                     del = false;
00421                 }
00422             }
00423 
00424             if (!del)
00425             {
00426                 return;
00427             }
00428 
00429             // Delete the column if requested.
00430             QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new ColumnDeleteCommand(diagram_->getColumnLayout(), column));
00431             editProvider_->addCommand(cmd);
00432         }
00433 
00434         // if something was removed then save button must be enabled again
00435         emit contentChanged();
00436     }
00437 }

00439 QSharedPointer<Component> DesignWidget::createEmptyDesign(const VLNV* prevlnv) {
00440     
00441         Q_ASSERT_X(prevlnv, "DesignWidget::createEmptyDesign",
00442                 "Null vlnv pointer given as parameter.");
00443 
00444         VLNV vlnv;
00445         QString path;
00446 
00447         if (prevlnv->isValid() && lh_->contains(*prevlnv)) {
00448                 vlnv = *prevlnv;
00449                 path = lh_->getPath(*prevlnv);
00450                 QFileInfo info(path);
00451                 path = info.absolutePath();
00452         }
00453         else {
00454         NewObjectDialog newDesignDialog(lh_, VLNV::COMPONENT, true, parentWidget());
00455                 newDesignDialog.setVLNV(*prevlnv);
00456                 newDesignDialog.exec();
00457 
00458                 if (newDesignDialog.result() == QDialog::Rejected)
00459                         return QSharedPointer<Component>();
00460 
00461                 vlnv = newDesignDialog.getVLNV();
00462                 path = newDesignDialog.getPath();
00463         }
00464 
00465         QSharedPointer<Component> newComponent;
00466         
00467         if (lh_->contains(*prevlnv)) {
00468                 // find the component
00469                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*prevlnv);
00470                 newComponent = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00471 
00472                 Q_ASSERT_X(newComponent, "DesignWidget::createEmptyDesign",
00473                         "The selected library item has to be component");
00474         }
00475         else {
00476                 // create the component 
00477                 newComponent = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component(vlnv));
00478         }
00479 
00480         createDesignForComponent(newComponent, path);
00481 
00482         lh_->writeModelToFile(path, newComponent);
00483 
00484 //     QFile compFile(path + "/" + vlnv.getName() + "." + 
00485 //              designVLNV.getVersion() + ".xml");
00486 //     compFile.open(QFile::WriteOnly | QFile::Truncate);
00487 //     newComponent->write(compFile);
00488 //      compFile.close();
00489 
00490         // register the vlnvs to the library
00491 
00492         // if the component already existed in the library
00493 //      if (lh_->contains(*prevlnv)) {
00494 //              lh_->updatePath(vlnv, compFile.fileName());
00495 //      }
00496 //      else {
00497 //              lh_->registerVLNV(vlnv, compFile.fileName());
00498 //      }
00499 
00500 //     lh_->registerVLNV(designVLNV, designFile.fileName());
00501 //      lh_->registerVLNV(desConfVLNV, desConfFile.fileName());
00502 
00503     return newComponent;
00504 }
00505 
00506 void DesignWidget::createDesignForComponent( QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00507                                                                                         const QString& dirPath) {
00508         VLNV vlnv = *component->getVlnv();
00509 
00510         // create a unique vlnv for the design
00511         VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00512                 vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
00513         int runningNumber = 1;
00514         QString version = designVLNV.getVersion();
00515         // if vlnv is reserved then add "(<number>)" to end of version field
00516         while (lh_->contains(designVLNV)) {
00517                 ++runningNumber;
00518                 designVLNV.setVersion(version + "(" + QString::number(runningNumber) + ")");
00519         }
00520 
00521         // create a unique vlnv for the design configuration
00522         VLNV desConfVLNV(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00523                 vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".designcfg", vlnv.getVersion());
00524         runningNumber = 1;
00525         version = desConfVLNV.getVersion();
00526         // if vlnv is reserved then add "(<number>)" to end of version field
00527         while (lh_->contains(desConfVLNV)) {
00528                 ++runningNumber;
00529                 desConfVLNV.setVersion(version + "(" + QString::number(runningNumber) + ")");
00530         }
00531 
00532         // the name of the view to create
00533         viewName_ = tr("structural");
00534 
00535         // and a hierarchical view for it
00536         Model *model = component->getModel();
00537         Q_ASSERT(model);
00538         View *hierView = new View(viewName_);
00539         hierView->setHierarchyRef(desConfVLNV);
00540         hierView->addEnvIdentifier("");
00541         model->addView(hierView);
00542 
00543         // create the design configuration
00544         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf(new DesignConfiguration(desConfVLNV));
00545         designConf->setDesignRef(designVLNV);
00546 
00547         QSharedPointer<Design> newDesign = QSharedPointer<Design>(new Design(designVLNV));
00548 
00549         lh_->writeModelToFile(dirPath, newDesign);
00550         lh_->writeModelToFile(dirPath, designConf);
00551 
00552         diagram_->setDesign(component, viewName_);
00553 }
00554 
00555 void DesignWidget::onVhdlGenerate() {
00556         
00557         if (isModified() && askSaveFile()) {
00558                 save();
00559         }
00560 
00561         QString fileName = lh_->getPath(*hierComponent_->getVlnv());
00562         QFileInfo targetInfo(fileName);
00563         fileName = targetInfo.absolutePath();
00564         fileName += QString("/");
00565         fileName += hierComponent_->getVlnv()->getName();
00566         fileName += QString(".%1").arg(viewName_);
00567         fileName += QString(".vhd");
00568 
00569         QString path = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
00570                 tr("Set the directory where the vhdl file is created to"),
00571                 fileName, tr("Vhdl files (*.vhd)"));
00572 
00573         // if user clicks cancel then nothing is created
00574         if (path.isEmpty())
00575                 return;
00576 
00577         VhdlGenerator2 vhdlGen(lh_, this);
00578         vhdlGen.parse(hierComponent_, viewName_);
00579         vhdlGen.generateVhdl(path);
00580 
00581         // ask user if he wants to save the generated vhdl into object metadata
00582         QMessageBox::StandardButton button = QMessageBox::question(this, 
00583                 tr("Save generated file to metadata?"),
00584                 tr("Would you like to save the generated vhdl-file to IP-Xact"
00585                 " metadata?"), QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes);
00586 
00587         // if the generated file is saved
00588         if (button == QMessageBox::Yes) {
00589 
00590                 // add a rtl view to the hierComponent_
00591                 vhdlGen.addRTLView(path);
00592 
00593                 // write the hierComponent_ into file system
00594                 lh_->writeModelToFile(hierComponent_);
00595 
00596                 emit refresh(this);
00597         }
00598 }
00599 
00600 void DesignWidget::onQuartusGenerate() {
00601 
00602         if (isModified() && askSaveFile()) {
00603                 save();
00604         }
00605 
00606         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*hierComponent_->getVlnv());
00607         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00608 
00609         QString path = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this,
00610                 tr("Set the directory where the Quartus project is created to"),
00611                 lh_->getPath(*hierComponent_->getVlnv()));
00612 
00613         // if user clicks cancel then nothing is created
00614         if (path.isEmpty())
00615                 return;
00616 
00617         // create the quartus project
00618         QuartusGenerator quartusGen(lh_, this);
00619         connect(&quartusGen, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00620                 this, SIGNAL(errorMsg(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00621         connect(&quartusGen, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00622                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMsg(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00623 
00624         // try to find the pin maps
00625         quartusGen.setBoardName(component);
00626 
00627         // parse the files from components
00628         quartusGen.parseFiles(component, viewName_);
00629 
00630         quartusGen.generateProject(path, component->getVlnv()->getName());
00631 }
00632 
00633 void DesignWidget::onModelsimGenerate() {
00634 
00635         if (isModified() && askSaveFile()) {
00636                 save();
00637         }
00638 
00639         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(*hierComponent_->getVlnv());
00640         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00641 
00642         QString fileName = lh_->getPath(*component->getVlnv());
00643         QFileInfo targetInfo(fileName);
00644         fileName = targetInfo.absolutePath();
00645         fileName += QString("/create_makefile");
00646 
00647         // ask user to select a location to save the makefile
00648         fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, 
00649                 tr("Set the file name for the modelsim script."), fileName);
00650 
00651         // if user clicked cancel
00652         if (fileName.isEmpty())
00653                 return;
00654 
00655 
00656         // construct the generator
00657         ModelsimGenerator generator(lh_, this);
00658         connect(&generator, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00659                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMsg(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00660         connect(&generator, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00661                 this, SIGNAL(errorMsg(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00662 
00663         // parse the component and view / sub-designs
00664         generator.parseFiles(component, viewName_);
00665 
00666         // create the script file
00667         generator.generateMakefile(fileName);
00668 
00669         // ask user if he wants to save the generated modelsim script into 
00670         // object metadata
00671         QMessageBox::StandardButton button = QMessageBox::question(this, 
00672                 tr("Save generated modelsim script to metadata?"),
00673                 tr("Would you like to save the generated modelsim script to IP-Xact"
00674                 " metadata?"), QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes);
00675 
00676         // if the generated file is saved
00677         if (button == QMessageBox::Yes) {
00678 
00679                 QString xmlPath = lh_->getPath(*component->getVlnv());
00680 
00681                 // if the file was successfully added to the library
00682                 if (generator.addMakefile2IPXact(component, fileName, xmlPath)) {
00683                         lh_->writeModelToFile(component);
00684                 }
00685         }
00686 }
00687 
00688 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00689 // Function: onVerticalScroll()
00690 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00691 void DesignWidget::onVerticalScroll(int y)
00692 {
00693     QPointF pt(0.0, y);
00694     QMatrix mat = view_->matrix().inverted();
00695     diagram_->onVerticalScroll(mat.map(pt).y());
00696 }
00697 
00698 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00699 // Function: addColumn()
00700 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00701 void DesignWidget::addColumn()
00702 {
00703     ColumnEditDialog dlg(this);
00704 
00705     if (dlg.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
00706     {
00707         diagram_->addColumn(dlg.getName(), dlg.getContentType(), dlg.getAllowedItems());
00708     }
00709 }
00710 
00711 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00712 // Function: setZoomLevel()
00713 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00714 void DesignWidget::setZoomLevel(int level)
00715 {
00716     TabDocument::setZoomLevel(level);
00717 
00718     double newScale = getZoomLevel() / 100.0;
00719     QMatrix oldMatrix = view_->matrix();
00720     view_->resetMatrix();
00721     view_->translate(oldMatrix.dx(), oldMatrix.dy());
00722     view_->scale(newScale, newScale);
00723 
00724     emit zoomChanged();
00725 }
00726 
00727 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00728 // Function: fitInView()
00729 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00730 void DesignWidget::fitInView()
00731 {
00732     QRectF itemRect = diagram_->itemsBoundingRect();
00733     float scaleX = std::max(0, view_->width() - 10 - view_->verticalScrollBar()->width()) / itemRect.width();
00734     float scaleY = std::max(0, view_->height() - 10 - view_->horizontalScrollBar()->height()) / itemRect.height();
00735 
00736     int scaleLevel = int(std::min(scaleX, scaleY) * 10) * 10;
00737     setZoomLevel(scaleLevel);
00738 
00739     view_->centerOn(itemRect.center());
00740 }

00750 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00751 // Function: getSupportedDrawModes()
00752 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00753 unsigned int DesignWidget::getSupportedDrawModes() const
00754 {
00755     if (!isProtected())
00756     {
00757         return (MODE_SELECT | MODE_CONNECT | MODE_INTERFACE | MODE_DRAFT);
00758     }
00759     else
00760     {
00761         // Force to selection mode in read-only mode.
00762         return MODE_SELECT;
00763     }
00764 }

00810 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00811 // Function: refresh()
00812 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00813 void DesignWidget::refresh()
00814 {
00815     Q_ASSERT(!isModified());
00816     diagram_->setDesign(hierComponent_, viewName_);
00817 
00818     setModified(false);
00819 
00820         TabDocument::refresh();
00821 }

00823 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00824 // Function: print()
00825 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00826 void DesignWidget::print()
00827 {
00828 
00829         // get the rect that bounds all items on box
00830         QRectF boundingRect = diagram_->itemsBoundingRect();
00831         
00832         // avoid clipping of the edges of the objects by increasing the rect a little
00833         boundingRect.setHeight(boundingRect.height() + 2);
00834         boundingRect.setWidth(boundingRect.width() + 2);
00835 
00836         // set the size of the picture
00837         QPixmap pic(boundingRect.size().toSize());
00838 
00839         // render the picture for the design
00840         QPainter picPainter(&pic);
00841         picPainter.fillRect(pic.rect(), QBrush(Qt::white));
00842         diagram_->render(&picPainter, pic.rect(), boundingRect.toRect());
00843         
00844         // create the printer instance, set default settings for it and
00845         // execute print dialog for user to select the printer and desired options
00846     QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
00847         printer.setOrientation(QPrinter::Landscape);
00848         printer.setPaperSize(QPrinter::A4);
00849     QPrintDialog dialog(&printer, this);
00850 
00851     if (dialog.exec() == QPrintDialog::Accepted)
00852     {
00853                 // create painter instance to draw the picture for the printer
00854         QPainter painter(&printer);
00855                 painter.setRenderHints(QPainter::Antialiasing | QPainter::TextAntialiasing |
00856                         QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, true);
00857 
00858                 // scale the picture to match the size of the printer page
00859                 QPixmap scaledPixmap = pic.scaled(printer.pageRect().size(),
00860                         Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
00861 
00862                 // draw the picture on the printer
00863                 painter.drawPixmap(printer.pageRect().topLeft(), scaledPixmap);
00864     }
00865 }
